00017 int TOctalFADCIsland::GetMax(int first, int last) const
00018 {
00019   if(last < first || last >= fData.size() || first < 0){
00020     cerr << "TOctalFADCIsland::GetMax() : Error! arguments out of range." << endl;
00021   }
00022   // max_element returns an iterator to the maximum element in the range.
00023   return *(std::max_element(fData.begin() + first, fData.begin() + last + 1));
00024 }

00026 int TOctalFADCIsland::GetMaxBin(int first, int last) const
00027 {
00028   if(last < first || last >= fData.size() || first < 0)
00029   {
00030     cout << "first = " << first << "   last : " << last << "   size : " << fData.size() << endl;
00031     cerr << "TOctalFADCIsland::GetMaxBin() : Error! arguments out of range." << endl;
00032   }
00033   return std::max_element(fData.begin()+first,fData.begin()+last+1)
00034             - fData.begin();
00035 }

00042 double TOctalFADCIsland::GetAverageMax(int nAv, int first, int last) const
00043 {
00044   if(last < first || last >= fData.size() || first < 0 || nAv < 0){
00045     cerr << "TOctalFADCIsland::GetAverageMax() : Error! arguments out of range."
00046          << endl;
00047   }
00048 
00049   int maxbin = GetMaxBin(first,last);
00050   int sum = *(std::max_element(fData.begin()+first,fData.begin()+last+1));
00051   int skipped = 0;
00052   int ind;
00053 
00054   for(int i=1; i<=nAv; i++)
00055   {
00056     ind = maxbin + static_cast<int>((i/2.+ 0.5)*pow(-1,i));
00057     if(ind > first && ind < last){sum = sum + fData[ind];}
00058     else{skipped++;}
00059   }
00060 
00061   return static_cast<double>(sum)/(nAv+1.-skipped);
00062 }

00064 int TOctalFADCIsland::GetMaxBinTime(int first, int last) const
00065 {
00066   if(last < first || last >= fData.size() || first < 0){
00067     cerr << "TOctalFADCIsland::GetMaxBinTime() : Error! arguments out of range." 
00068          << endl;
00069   }
00070   return GetTime() + GetMaxBin(first,last);
00071 }

00073 int TOctalFADCIsland::GetCFBlockTime(int first, int last) const
00074 {
00075   if(last < first || last >= fData.size() || first < 0){
00076     cerr << "TOctalFADCIsland::GetCFBlockTime() : Error! arguments out of range."
00077          << endl;
00078   }
00079   return GetCFBin(first,last)+GetTime();

00085 int TOctalFADCIsland::GetCFBin(int first, int last) const
00086 {
00087   if(last < first || last >= fData.size() || first < 0){
00088     cerr << "TOctalFADCIsland::GetCFBlockTime() : Error! arguments out of range." 
00089          << endl;
00090   }
00091 
00092   // Take the non-zero pedestal into account
00093   int max = GetMax(first,last) - fData[first];
00094   int maxbin = GetMaxBin(first,last);
00095   double halfmax = max/2.;
00096   int constantFraction = first;
00097   double value = -1.;
00098 
00099   while( value < halfmax && constantFraction < maxbin)
00100   {
00101     value = static_cast<double>(fData[constantFraction]);
00102     constantFraction++;
00103   }
00104 
00105   return constantFraction;
00106 }
00107 
00108 double TOctalFADCIsland::GetAverage(int first, int last) const
00109 {
00110   if(last < first ){return -1.;}
00111   if(first<0){first=0;}
00112   if(last >= fData.size()){last = fData.size();}
00113 
00114   int sum = 0;
00115   int N = 0;
00116 
00117   for(int i = first; i <= last; i++)
00118   {
00119     sum += fData[i];
00120     N += 1;
00121   }
00122 
00123   return static_cast<double>(sum)/N;
00124 }
00125 
00126 double TOctalFADCIsland::GetIntegral(int first, int last) const
00127 {
00128   if(last < first ){return -1.;}
00129   if(first<0) { first=0; }
00130   if(last >= fData.size()) { last = fData.size() - 1; }
00131 
00132   int sum = 0;
00133 
00134   for(int i = first; i <= last; i++)
00135   {
00136     sum += fData[i];
00137   }
00138 
00139   return static_cast<double>(sum);
00140 }
